Lecroy instrument drivers¶

class pyslave.drivers.lecroy.lecroyscope.LecroyScope(resource, *args, **kwargs)¶

Lecroy oscilloscope instrument driver. Direct call to the instrument invokes the fetch method.

fetch(channel='C1')¶

Fetch the waveform from the specified channel (‘C1’,’C2,’TA’, ...) and return it as a lecroy_trace data object.

write(str)¶

Write GPIB command.
